name: @tiflis-io/tiflis-code-stt
description: OpenAI-compatible Speech-to-Text API with MLX and faster-whisper backends

scripts.build: echo 'Python package - no build step required'
scripts.lint: command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1 && ruff check src/ || echo 'ruff not installed, skipping lint'
scripts.lint:fix: command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1 && ruff check --fix src/ || echo 'ruff not installed, skipping lint:fix'
scripts.typecheck: command -v pyright >/dev/null 2>&1 && pyright src/ || echo 'pyright not installed, skipping typecheck'
scripts.test: command -v pytest >/dev/null 2>&1 && pytest tests/ || echo 'pytest not installed, skipping tests'

author: Roman Barinov <rbarinov@gmail.com>
